Name: Secrets of Magic 5: Back to School
About the game: Victoria and Beatrix are back at the School of Magic just in time to celebrate the best time of the year, Halloween! And these two amazing witches need your help to decorate the schoolhouse for this exciting celebration. Get ready and join the adventure in this brand new match 3 game! Features Help Victoria find Hidden ingredients in 3D scenes Master the gameplay by beating the top scores Earn golden coins and buy spooky decorations Solve amazing Jigsaw Puzzles Welcome to a fun Halloween party Play Secrets of Magic 4: Potion Master / Play Secrets of Magic 3: Happy Halloween / Play Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards / Play Secrets of Magic: The Book of Spells /
